titleStmt.title: The last speech of M. Peter Vowell, which he intended to have delivered (had he been permitted) upon the tenth of July, 1654. Being the day of his suffering death, in the place where Charing Cross once stood. Written by himself a little before his suffering. Published for general satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: Vowell, Peter, d. 1654.

titleStmt.title: The last speech of M. Peter Vowell, which he intended to have delivered (had he been permitted) upon the tenth of July, 1654.
